name: Hy-Power Eye, Cheek & Lip Pigment Paint
about: What it is: Clean, transfer-proof, multi-use pigment paints that leave skin feeling moisturized and nourished..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Plant Squalane: Protects and softens skin..- Hyaluronic Acid: Provides skin-loving hydration..- Maracuja Extract: Nourishes, hydrates, cares for, and calms skin..Ingredient Callouts: This product is clean, vegan, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know: These hydrating, waterproof pigments deliver comfortable wear and superior color intensity on the eyes, lips, cheeks + body.  No creasing or flaking. Highly blendable and easy to use. Clinically, Dermatologist + Ophthalmologist tested. Some shades have usage restrictions...
ingredients: -Plant Squalane: Protects and softens skin..-Hyaluronic Acid: Provides skin-loving hydration..-Maracula Extract: Nourishes, hydrates, cares for, and calms skin...Isododecane, Dicalcium Phosphate, Octyldodecanol, Silica, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Passiflora Edulis Seed Oil, Squalane, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Caprylyl Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Hexylene Glycol, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Phenoxyethanol. May Contain/Peut Contenir: (+/-) Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 77491/77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 15985 (Yellow 6 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6), Ci 45410 (Red 28 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide)...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to face or body with a brush and allow product to set..-Mix paints to create custom shades..Precautions:.-Made with vegan pigments that may stain skin and fabric..-Sapphire Matte, Flame Matte, Fuchsia Matte, Scarlet Matte, and Magenta Shimmer are not suitable for use on eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product and have picked it up in a number of shades now. Great staying power, easy to put on. it is very versatile. I highly recommend.

I needed a black lipstick for Halloween and one of the employees recommended this.  Although I have always loved the idea of a black lipstick the ones I have used in the past did not stay on and the coverage was horrible. Thankfully this product has changed my mind.  It was so easy to apply. First I tested it on the back of my hand to see how it came out of the tube and then lined and filled my lips effortlessly.  The color saturated my lips and stayed consistent throughout the night. One tip is to move quickly when applying because once it's on, it's on! It a matte finish but it kept my lips feeling hydrated. At the end of the night I used a little coconut oil to remove it from my lips.  I love this formula. I am so happy I can now wear black lipstick that looks great all night!!

reviews.review_title: Lasted more than 48hrs on a Road Trip!!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you want a long lasting, matte, bold look, I definitely recommend this pigment paint!  After months of not touching this because it didn‚Äôt fit my needs at the time, I gave this pigment paint a second shot when I was driving from midnight to 6AM on a road trip to Yosemite. It lasted the whole night and through the next day and more! It did not budge one bit, stayed on even when I touched to get rid of an itch on my eye, and the whole red-eyed, exhausted dry eye and eye drop day after.  The black matte may not be for everybody‚Äôs everyday use, but as a gothic girlie that wears the under-eye makeup heavy, this is a godsend!  I LOVE how it doesn‚Äôt move or fall off at all like black eyeshadow, which I had been using as a setting powder for my eyeliner looks ‚Äòtil now.  This product will become my replacement for the black eyeshadow and black eyeliner I used to get that bold look on my under eyes because it does not budge at all!  If you‚Äôre more the artsy type that likes to manipulate intricate lines or designs, I highly recommend this as your BLACK eyeshadow, eyeliner, whichever.  The only complaint I have is that it‚Äôs not good on the waterline.  If this pigment paint could be used on waterlines as well as the face SAFELY, I would have no further complaints.  I highly recommend this pigment paint for experienced makeup users who know what design they‚Äôre going for, and have a steady hand. It might be a little difficult for beginners.  That said, its staying power is superior to all other products I‚Äôve ever used! I think the key is, using MORE than you think is necessary for the pigment to stick all day :)

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Scarlet Matte - primary red *DO NOT USE ON EYES
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this twice now as face paint to recreate Ziggy Stardust's lightening bolt for roller derby.  The Scarlette Matte is perfect; bold, highly pigmented, perfect coverage, and a very little goes a long way. Unfortunately the Sapphire Matte is not the same. The blue is not as bright or pigmented. It takes a lot more product to get the same results and the coverage is sketchy. I actually blend in a brighter blue eyeliner to get a nice bold look.  Both colors have extreme staying power. I use a setting spray to help, but I doubt it's necessary for casual use. I wear it for at least 12 hrs and sweat a lot. Never budges.  It doesn't irritate my skin at all, even with the arduous removal process (keep reading).  The best feature (staying power) is also its biggest flaw. This stuff takes WORK to get off. I've ended up with a combo of waterproof makeup remover, baby oil, rubbing alcohol, and then two washes with good ol' fashioned soap and water. I still have to scrub a bit more off with makeup remover.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you like little glitter particles to end up all over your face, then Gold Shimmer is for you! There are 2 things to consider here - the formulation and the color. The formulation is interesting - it's creamy as you apply it. But you have to let it set a while before you apply other shadows or you will rub it off. Takes a little longer to set than other cream products. After setting, though, it stays a bit tacky, so if you're applying other shadows, you need to dab or pat them on, not swipe. If you swipe, you end up loosening little glitter particles with your brush and they end up all over your eye area, brows, and even on your face. The formulation has a lot of staying power, though. It has a distinct smell. My dog even came over to see what I was applying to the back of my hand when I was testing it. (2) The gold shimmer color  is pretty, but it also contains glitter particles that end up migrating all over the place over time. Other colors might not have this issue.

Another bonus, this is waterproof as heck, I tried just washing my hands with soap and water and couldn't get it out until I scratched it off my skin, I should have went in with my cleansing balm.

I have dry skin and these did not dry out my skin and I barely felt like I had makeup on. I received compliments all night and somehow became the put-together one in the group. On my eyes, I started by using my finger, one tiny drop for both lids and then buffed out with a brush. After it dried down I put a cream highlight just above the iris of my eyes. Easily build able and I have found I can apply it with just a finger if I don't want to bother with the brush. It makes a wonderful base for other eye products, or can be the whole look. I will be buying this again as well as getting more colors to add to the collection!

I also really like how this Hy-Power Pigment Paint does not wear off throughout the day and does not smudge in this humid summer weather. I do think the price is a little high as this product has a Net Wt. 0.25Oz. However, I do believe this product will last a while because you don‚Äôt need much in order to get a very rich amount applied to your face. So if you‚Äôre looking for a new versatile product that is rich and quality and shows really well on all skin tones this would be your perfect product. I am a huge fan of matte finish products but every now and then I do like a good shimmer so I do intend to try out the same product in different shimmer shades as well. I love that this cosmetics line is Vegan and Cruelty-Free and that it‚Äôs Lady GaGa‚Äôs line as I‚Äôm a huge fan. reviews.review_title: Great for easy and long lasting look!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.  This pigment paint is definitely a new type of product in my stash.  The packaging it comes in appears to be recycled cardboard free of dye and that absolutely lends toward the aesthetic of clean beauty.  I am thrilled that Gaga‚Äôs rebrand is clean as I truly enjoy using products that are friendly to those that use them and the environment.  The tube that the pigment paint comes in is smooth and simple and the color matches the pigment paint shade which will be nice if you own multiple shades.  I applied some to the back of my hand and used my finger to apply to my eyelid and a brush to lightly blend the edge into some bronzer.  It does dry down quickly and I had to work fast on only one eye at a time.  The formula isn‚Äôt thick on the eyelid and has amazing gripping power.  It stayed in place through a long, hot and sweaty day without creasing or budging.  This is meaningful to me as I have oily skin and eyelids and I was amazed at its stamina!  The rose gold color is subtle on this one but the shimmer is beautiful.  I would imagine the matte shades are more intense in color. Overall, I enjoyed this product with its quick application.  The fast drying time did not bother me as I find that if it takes longer, it‚Äôs more of a hassle to keep your eye closed while it dries to limit creasing!  I would recommend this particular shade to anyone looking for an easy and subtle makeup look or to use as a shadow topper.  If you‚Äôre looking for more of a statement look, try some of the colorful matte shades!  I will definitely enjoying continuing use of this product especially when I need something this summer to stay put!!

reviews.review_text: I was sent the Hy-Power Pigment Paint for free from Influenster and Haus Labs in exchange for my honest feedback. The short version- I give the product itself, 5/5 stars and the color I was sent 4/5 stars. I would buy it again, but it does concern me some of the colors specifically mention not being safe to use on eyes when most of the colors of the pigment paint are.   The long version- this pigment paint packs a punch. A TINY bit goes a long way and how you apply it will change the final finish. I squeezed the tube ever so slightly (just enough for product to start coming out) and used that little bit. For a more full coverage, I used my finger and blended it out using a dabbing motion (see the first picture for the outcome). I would use this for an eyeshadow look. For a more sheer coverage, after applying a moisturizer and my foundation, I pressed my finger into the same little small amount of pigment paint, dabbed three dots on each cheek, and blended it out with a wet beauty sponge (see second photo). While this color isn‚Äôt my go to blush color, I felt this created a nice blush finish and I would consider this color in the future. I have decently dry skin. I ate dinner with the pigment paint applied this way and didn‚Äôt feel like it was overly drying or cakey. In fact, I felt like it blended nicely and I didn‚Äôt really notice it after blending it. I‚Äôll definitely be buying other colors to try after it becomes available for everyone.
